blogPost.excerpt: Ever wondered what would happen to crypto wallet after you die ? Want to leave a message to world the day you pass away ? I would love to get your feedback on the idea, the design and the user experience :-) Most of the actions are work in progress though.
blogPost.body: Ever wondered what would happen to crypto wallet after you die ? Want to leave a message to world the day you pass away ? I would love to get your feedback on the idea, the design and the user experience :-) Most of the actions are work in progress though.
blogPost.title: Wayt - Don't leave without saying goodbye
blogPost.author: Maxime Troiano

localize.description: 有没有想过，你死后，加密钱包会发生什么？想在你去世的那一天给世界留下一句话吗？我很想得到你对这个想法、设计和用户体验的反馈：-) 不过大部分的操作都在进行中。
有沒有想過，你死後，加密錢包會發生什麼？想在你去世的那一天給世界留下一句話嗎？我很想得到你對這個想法、設計和用戶體驗的反饋：-) 不過大部分的操作都在進行中。

previous.excerpt: A list of stores for package free food and product🧀, recycling and compost ♻️. Our goal is to end single use plastic.

next.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
next.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases

localize.description: Global.health是来自主要国际机构的技术专家和研究人员的合作努力，旨在建立一个值得信赖、详细、准确的实时传染病数据资源。
localize.tagline: 获取500万+匿名的COVID-19案例的数据

localize.description: Global.health是來自主要國際機構的技術專家和研究人員的合作努力，旨在建立一個值得信賴、詳細、準確的實時傳染病數據資源。
localize.tagline: 獲取500萬+匿名的COVID-19案例的數據
